english.segment1: Though I am poor and needy. My Shelter You'll be. Not by my merit lead me. To where You say
english.segment2: Waste my time on lover's quarrels. Speed my breath and hope to stumble. Out of my distrain and still. You Remain
english.segment3: My Wall, my Mighty Tower. Be my Shadow come cover me. Till all my enemies cower. Jealous of my King
english.segment4: Though the day be laced with trouble. Be the stone o'er which I stumble. Straight into the arms and stay. Where You Remain
english.segment5: They said to me I would fall by the wayside. Answer me now. Answer me now
english.segment6: The fatherless we may be weary. Be our Peace and do not tarry. Wait we will for Your Joy
english.segment7: Be my Portion promised me, o Lord. May I be forever. Where You Remain. Where You remain. Where You.. Where You remain
